objects.text:
• Premium Pink Matte Blush With Mirror
• Matching Bright Pink Lipstick
• Long-lasting Color Pigments
• Suitable For All Skin Types

product_details.name: Pink Perfection: Luxury Blush & Lipstick Beauty Set
product_details.description:
• Premium pink matte blush compact with mirror for flawless application
• Silky-smooth powder formula for natural-looking flush
• Sleek black compact case with protective mirror
• Matching bright pink lipstick in elegant silver tube
• Long-lasting color pigments for all-day wear
• Professional-grade cosmetic duo for complete look
• Travel-friendly size perfect for on-the-go touch-ups
• Dermatologically tested and suitable for all skin types
• Complementary pink shades for coordinated makeup look
• Modern packaging design with premium finish

banner_details:
The banner showcases a glamorous promotional ad for a cosmetic product bundle, featuring a lipstick and blush set with a sophisticated and feminine visual treatment. It utilizes a layered layout with a soft pink gradient background overlaid by decorative abstract strokes and border rectangles. Bold, attention-grabbing typography is used for key text areas: the main promotional message (`tagline`) is large and uppercase in a tall bold font, followed by a striking product name (`heading`) and a smaller elegant subheading (`subheading`). Informative bullet points (`description`) describe the product benefits. A motivational message (`call_to_action_text`) precedes the pricing detail (`price`). A visually appealing product image (`product_image`) is placed prominently on the right. A CTA button (`cta_background`, `cta`) in a rounded rectangle format anchors the visual hierarchy.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Blush Pink: `#FFF8FA`
- Bright Pink: `#F06292`
- Bold Magenta: `#EC407A`
- Deep Rose: `#AD1457`
- Dark Plum: `#880E4F`
- Accent Pink Outline: `#FF80AB`
- White Text on Buttons: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image prominently features a harmonious blend of soft pink and sleek black tones, making it ideal for a feminine, elegant advertisement banner. The primary pink shade (#EC5DA9) from the lipstick and blush adds a soft, romantic appeal. This is contrasted and grounded by the intense black (#1C1C1C) of the compact case and lipstick base, conveying sophistication. The metallic silver (#C0C0C0) on the lipstick casing introduces a modern, luxurious feel. The background is a light neutral white-gray (#F5F5F5), which enhances product visibility. Together, these colors balance softness and glamor, making them perfect for a chic beauty brand theme.
